timeline.headline: José Gómez de Lara
timeline.text:
Software Engineer - UX Designer
Game Developer - Producer

asset.credit: Jose Gomez de Lara - Curriculum Vitae / Resumeé

date.headline: DivNet - Game Online Magazine
date.text:
Independent Project

DivNet was an amateur videogame magazine published monthly, created to be a community gathering place for code collaboration, indie games, etc... It was a collaborative effort between several people in Spain and South America
Its publication spanned for several years and currently survives as a forum at forum.divsite.net

date.headline: Web Applications Engineer - Graphic Designer
date.text:
Baetica, S.L. - Madrid, Spain

Responsible for company´s back end development (ASP, PHP, XML)
Participation in development of internal tools involving porting and QA.
Participation in design and production of graphic assets for front end development www.baetica.es

date.headline: BSc. Information Engineering & Management.
date.text:
Bachelor of Science: Information Engineering & Management at Universidad Europea de Madrid, www.uem.es

1999 - 2003 | Fields:

Software Engineering, Bussiness Administration, Object Oriented Programming Techniques, Networking and Distributed Systems

date.headline: Radical Graphics Studios
date.text:
Independent Project

Founded Radical Graphics Studios with two friends in a borrowed office space in Marbella, Spain. All started as a moniker for naming our different projects.
A wide range of stuff we were, and are, tinkering: web, game, mobile, video, music, fashion, social networks...
www.radicalgraphics.com

date.headline: Information Technology Exchange Internship
date.text:
Information Technology Erasmus Exchange at Hogeschool van Amsterdam
www.hva.nl

2004 - 2005 | Fields:

ICT in Marketing, IT Management, Java Server Pages, C++, Unix and Network Management

date.headline: Web Applications Engineer
date.text:

Development, deployment and design of back-end & front-end Systems for Global Retail Engine (PHP, Java, SQL, CSS).
Participation in development of Online Travel Agent (OTA) XML Interface for internal processes and technology improvement.
www.cartrawler.com

date.headline: Localization QA
date.text:

Identify, isolate, and document bugs clearly and concisely.
Run test suites; verify fixes, spot grammar and language mistakes.
Follow the documented processes at all stages of the testing cycle.
www.keywordsintl.com

date.text:
Keywords International, Ltd. - Dublin, Ireland

Produce and track bug reports, coverage status and test project schedules.

date.text:
Microsoft Game Studios, EMEA - Dublin, Ireland

Input into the production of test documentation.
Produce test plans and bug reports for all releases as necessary.
Liaise with Customer Support team to analyze and track external bugs.
Liaise with Development team on bug status and release status.
Liaise with Localization vendor on test mapping and coverage status.
www.microsoft.com/games

date.headline: Founder and Director
date.text:
Radical Graphics Studios - Amsterdam, The Netherlands

Radical Graphics Studios is a creative media design studio based in Amsterdam , The Netherlands.
We provide concepts , strategies and designs focused on new media and entertainment.
We merge game mechanics concepts and social media approaches through game development on different platforms (mobile, web, consoles)
Current developments include fashion goods production on demand and social advertising.
www.radicalgraphics.com

asset.caption:
Projects:



Looklala - Indie Trend www.looklala.com

date.headline: Build Engineer
date.text:
Guerrilla Games (Sony Europe) - Amsterdam, The Netherlands

- Collaborate with IT Support to maintain and support all facets of the build farm, including configuration, troubleshooting, software updates, and setting up new projects
Research new technologies and techniques to optimize the build process and enhance infrastructure performance.
Integrate the output of the development teams into releases and liaise with QA to have them tested.
www.guerrilla-games.com

date.headline: 3D Graphics & Animation Certification
date.text:
SAE Institute / Qantm College - Amsterdam, The Netherlands

2011 - 2012 | Fields:

Modelling, Texturing, Lightning, Cameras, Animating, Rendering.
Autodesk Maya, Adobe Creative Suite, Unity 3D

3D design has become an integral part of the graphics, art and multimedia industry. 3D graphics and animation are used in virtual environments, computer games, film productions, presentations, medical illustrations, architectural visualizations and on the web.
www.amsterdam.sae.edu
